schema.name: Garlic Soy Chicken Breast
recipeIngredient: 600 gram, Chicken breast, raw, with skin

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the ingredients: Finely chop the ginger and garlic cloves. Measure out all other ingredients as per the list.
In a small bowl, mix the low sodium soy sauce, coconut aminos, garlic granules, chopped ginger, and chopped garlic. Season with black pepper and salt to create the marinade.

Place the chicken breasts in a suitable marinating dish and pour the marinade over the chicken. Ensure each piece is well-coated. Add the bay leaves to the dish. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, preferably overnight, to marinate.
Transfer the marinated chicken breasts to a baking tray. Evenly distribute pieces of butter on top of each chicken breast.
Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes or until the chicken is thoroughly cooked and juices run clear.
Let the chicken rest for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy your delicious and healthy Garlic Soy Chicken Breast.

schema.description: Indulge in the savory and aromatic Garlic Soy Chicken Breast, a perfect dish for those who love high-protein and low-carb meals. Made with a delectable blend of spices, low sodium soy sauce, and coconut aminos, this recipe promises a tender and flavorful chicken breast that aligns with a healthy lifestyle. Perfect for anyone following a diet that appreciates the essence of quality ingredients without compromising on taste.
